sentences.en: At last future developments of micron op let in microfluidic are prospected.
sentences.cn: 论文展望了微液滴的发展前景.

sentences.en: Brown diffuse may be dominant operation for the sub - micron particle motion.
sentences.cn: 布朗扩散可能对亚微米颗粒运动起到主导作用.

sentences.en: Calculation result demonstrates consumption for preparing micron flake wood fiber is low.
sentences.cn: 结果显示,微米级长薄片木纤维切削功率较低.

sentences.en: Exclusively FDA - compliant pure polypropylene micron fiber.
sentences.cn: 使用符合FDA要求的过滤纯聚丙烯毛细纤维.

sentences.en: For example, if you say that something is "a few microns across", explain that a micron is one-millionth of a metre, and "about one hundredth the width of a human hair".
sentences.cn: 例如，如果您说某事物只有几微米，那么就要解释一微米是百万分之一米，大约是人头发宽度的百分之一。

sentences.en: It is able to trap particles above 0.3 micron in size.
sentences.cn: 它能阻隔0.3毫米以上的微粒.

sentences.en: Micron scale spheres may be preserved in quenched volcanic matrix.
sentences.cn: 有时微米级球体可以在淬冷火山岩基质中得以保存.

sentences.en: Nano - crystalline grain exists in ore particle with micron size.
sentences.cn: 微米级铁矿粉具有纳米尺度的晶粒.

sentences.en: One micron is a thousandth of a millimeter: a pinhead is about a millimeter across.
sentences.cn: 一微米等于千分之一毫米。 针头直径大约一毫米。

sentences.en: Stage 2 : Full thickness macular hole, can opener tear or pseudooperculum, 400 micron in diameter.
sentences.cn: 全层黄斑裂孔, 可为开罐式撕开或 假性 包盖,直径小于400微米(裂孔).

sentences.en: Standard sub micron grade for solid rotary tool applications.
sentences.cn: 是适用于可转位工具的晶粒度为亚微米级的标准牌号.

sentences.en: The particle radius unit, the micron, is especially common and useful.
sentences.cn: 粒子半径的单位是微米, 微米这个单位尤其普通和有用.

sentences.en: The principle of micron - nano - sized particles composite system was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了微 纳米颗粒 复合化系统的工作原理.

sentences.en: Therefore, four micron - scale wires can control 16 nanowires.
sentences.cn: 因此, 四根微米尺寸的导线可以控制16根奈米导线.

sentences.en: They all basically reach an ultimate vacuum pressure of. 1 micron.
sentences.cn: 它们基本上能达到. 1微米的极限真空压强.

sentences.en: They are available in premium grades from 0.1 to 45 micron.
sentences.cn: 他们是可利用的在优质成绩从0.1到45微米.

sentences.en: With this Optical Equipment , we are able to distinguish 0.025 micron microwave.
sentences.cn: 用这台光学仪器, 我们可以分辨出0.025微米的微波.

words.tran_cn: 微米（等于百万分之一米）

trans.tran_en: a unit of length equal to 10–6 metre
